channel.title: RSPS on Dial-up? HELP!
channel.description: Hey guys, a few nights ago hurricane Irene really fu**ed me over with the loss of power : / Today, I'm at my grandparents house and am cursed with the sad internet connection know as dial up..... I am try to play a server called NeverBackDown and you can look it up if youw ant blahblahblah... NOT ADVERTISING! JUST SAYING WHAT ITS CALLED SO PEOPLE CAN BETTER HELP ME WITH MY PROBLEM BY CHECKING IT OUT! I never have this problem on my high speed computer at home, but when I open up the webclient it says error loading - please report when I'm on my grandparents dial-up. Can somebody tell me how to fix this or if it is unfixable?

item.title: RSPS on Dial-up? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Mine is even air wave dialup lol.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS on Dial-up? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:9, topic:412910”]If you also uploaded a vid of it to youtube I can guarantee you your internet wasn’t dial-up unless it took over a week to upload.[/quote]If you read my post I clearly said the person that made the vid was one of my admins.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS on Dial-up? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

Oh well, I used to play on a Dial-Up and it hardly could load anything.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS on Dial-up? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

someone2:

Dial-Up is about 56 kb, meaning it can’t even run 1 player on a server without extreme lagg.

Wrong, my mobile phone is my internet modem and it is a 56k dial-up connection and I host a server all day long.

It’s only bytes streaming in and out when packets are sent. The rest is client sided meaning I don’t have to handle people’s model and animation loading because that’s handled on their side.

Are YOU sure YOU know what YOU’RE talking about? And for the record, I have an old 448MB RAM desktop with over 60 processes running.

someone2:

If you also uploaded a vid of it to youtube I can guarantee you your internet wasn’t dial-up unless it took over a week to upload.

I can upload my 14MB client in about 4 minutes. You’re very miss-informed. I can even play RuneScape on medium graphics, not the best but it’s playable.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS on Dial-up? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

If you also uploaded a vid of it to youtube I can guarantee you your internet wasn’t dial-up unless it took over a week to upload.

item.title: RSPS on Dial-up? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:6, topic:412910”]Dial-Up is about 56 kb, meaning it can’t even run 1 player on a server without extreme lagg.[/quote]Heres a vid of the server I hosted from along time ago (So it’s not a advert since the server has been down for over a year)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FLMJe-FUzm4
Yes I server was leeched and Shit but thats not the point, The Person making the vid was one of my admins, As you can see she isn’t lagging even though the server was being hosted off dial up.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS on Dial-up? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

someone2:

Dial-Up is about 56 kb, meaning it can’t even run 1 player on a server without extreme lagg.

LOL, All i can do is laugh at you, Dialup is reliable, its just a little bit slower, ive hosted off dialup for friends from my real life school, and it held about 50 with a very small 1/4 second delay…

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS on Dial-up? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:4, topic:412910”]Server with 30 players with no lagg on dial-up.

Are you sure you know what dial up is?[/quote]Yep, I had it for 3 Years as it was all that I could get in my area until this year.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS on Dial-up? HELP!

item.title: RSPS on Dial-up? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:2, topic:412910”]Remove the game name, it has no fucking thing to do with your problem.

You can’t play the game because Dial-Up is too slow. I think that’s obvious.[/quote]Yes you can I had dial up for 3 years up until this year, I even hosted a server for 4 months with no lagg (Although there was only 30 People Online at the Max) it works fine.

From the sounds of it I think it’s most likely the cache, try deleting it and trying again, If that doesn’t work then its probally the client, not your internet.

Read full topic
